title: Product set growth in Burnside groups. (arXiv:2102.10885v2 [math.GR] UPDATED)
description: Given a periodic quotient of a torsion-free hyperbolic group, we provide a fine lower estimate of the growth function of any sub-semi-group. This generalizes results of Razborov and Safin for free groups.
dc:creator: Rémi Coulon, Markus Steenbock
